snippet: The experts are concerned that Zohydro is not formulated to halt abuse and is manufactured by a company that makes a treatment for people dependent on painkillers or alcohol.
abstract: Addiction experts who protested after Food and Drug Administration approved Zohydro, powerful new opioid painkiller, raise additional concerns about drug; say that it is troubling that Zohydro will be manufactured by Alkermes, same company that makes a treatment for people dependent on painkillers or alcohol.
lead_paragraph: The experts are concerned that Zohydro is not formulated to halt abuse and is manufactured by a company that makes a treatment for people dependent on painkillers or alcohol.

headline.main: Addiction Specialists Wary of New Painkiller
headline.print_headline: Addiction Specialists Wary of New Painkiller
